errors.noBrowserSupport: It appears that you're using a browser that's not yet supported by Davis.
errors.chrome: If you'd like to fully experience Davis, please use the latest version of Chrome.
errors.noMic: Unfortunately, there appears to be no microphone enabled on your device. That's okay, as an alternative, feel free to use the text-box below to chat with me.
errors.server: There's an issue with the Davis server right now, please try again later.
errors.nullResponse: Sorry about that, I'm not sure what you meant, please try again.

greetings.micPermission: Please select "Allow" if asked for permission to use your microphone.
greetings.thenHelp: Then say "Hey Davis" or click the microphone when you're ready for help.
greetings.help: Just say "Hey Davis" or click the microphone when you're ready to ask Davis something!
